name: Tagmar
description: Provides a lookup for rolls in the Tagmar RPG.## Commands```!tagmar <skill> <roll> [descriptive text]```* `<skill>` - The value of the skill from -7 to 20. You can use inline rolls or attribute references to fill this in.* `<roll>` - The roll value. You will likely use an inline roll for this.* `[descriptive text]` - The rest of the command will be presented as a description of the roll.```!wtagmar <skill> <roll> [descriptive text]```Identical to `!tagmar` but whispered to the player.```!gtagmar <skill> <roll> [descriptive text]```Identical to `!tagmar` but the result is only whispered to the gm and the player.```!btagmar <skill> <roll> [descriptive text]```Identical to `!tagmar` but the result is only whispered to the gm while the group only sees ???.```!bwtagmar <skill> <roll> [descriptive text]```Identical to `!tagmar` but the result is only whispered to the gm while the player only sees ???.
